products.name: Jean Buttons
products.description_html:
Jean buttons are resistant to corrosion. In Jean shirts and trousers, it serves as the material that ensures the closure and opening of the fabrics by bringing the two upper edges to the top.

Fixed level button consists of 2 parts.

These are;

  • Fixed denim button,
  • Nail,

Application;

In combination with special fastening molds;

  • In hand press,
  • In armed machine,
  • In motored and automatic machines.

Measure;

Jean buttons can be manufactured in the dimensions specified by Cebeci Buttons reference table.

Logo;

Jean buttons can be produced with logo. (You can contact Cebeci Buttons authorities by filling the form on the contact page for logo printing).

Feature;

At Cebeci Buttons, we can come to a clearer understanding and help you better if we receive mock-up products for where the jean buttons will be pressed. Then, we can make experiments on them. If there is any pile difference on the fabric, we suggest you to open holes before the pressing took place. We can also provide you with information on how to press the jean buttons by preparing a data sheet report. Jean buttons can be produced in desired colors by selecting them from the coating chart.

For order and information supply, you can contact our customer representatives through the contact page and request samples before ordering.
products.spec_title: Dimensions
products.ul_product_tags:
• Ability to design desired logo and lettering
  • The product is resistant to corrosion.
  • OEKOTEX certification compatibility
  • Wide range of colors
  • Robust and strong structure

products.name: Brass Eyelets
products.description_html:
Brass eyelets are resistant to corrosion. They can be used for ornamental and functional purposes to add visuality depending on where it is used. Although, brass eyelets have a wide range of area to be used, it is mostly used in shoes, shirts, blouses, work clothes, knitwear, jean shirts, baby and children products. The lower part varies depending on the place it is used.

Brass eyelet consists of 3 parts.

These are;

  • Eyelet or capsule piece,
  • Plastic washer,
  • Metal washer,

Application;

In combination with special fastening molds;

  • In hand press,
  • In armed machine,
  • In motor and automatic machines.

Measure;

Brass eyelets, which are produced in different sizes, can be manufactured in the dimensions specified by Cebeci Buttons reference table.

Logo;

Some certain size of brass eyeletscan be produced with logo.  (You can contact Cebeci Buttons authorities by filling the form on the contact page for logo printing).

Feature;

At Cebeci Buttons, we can come to a clearer understanding and help you better if we receive mock-up products for where the brass eyelets will be pressed. Then, we can make experiments on them. If there is any pile difference on the fabric, we suggest that open holes before the pressing took place. We can also provide you with information on how to press the brass eyelets by preparing a data sheet report. Brass eyelets can be produced in desired colors by selecting them from the coating chart.

For order and information supply, you can contact our customer representatives through the contact page and request samples before ordering.

Stainless prong snap button with cap is made of stainless material. It serves as the material for closing and opening of the nails with clipped shirts, work clothes, coats, overcoats, knitwear, Jean shirts and baby and children products by overlapping the two sides of the fabrics.

Application;

Logo;

    The desired logo can be made with on the cap (top) part. (You can contact Ata manufacturing authorities by filling out the form on the contact page).

Feature;

  • It is important that there is no pile difference in the fabric where the press is to be made.
  • Depending on the type of fabric to be applied, the clamshell product can be selected as a long-leg and a short-leg.
  • We can test the mock-ups that you send to us and decide the nail length of the clamshell click.
  • We can also provide you with information on how to press by preparing a data sheet report.
  • The desired colors are produced from the coating chart as the color variety of the clamshell click.
  • Cap of the prong snap button can be colored according to the color diversity chart.

For order and information supply, you can contact our customer representatives through the contact page and request samples before ordering.

products.name: Stainless Pearl Cap Prong Snap Button
products.description_html:
Stainless prong snap button with pearl cap is made of stainless material. The product is resistant to corrosion. It serves as the material for closing and opening of the nails with clipped shirts, work clothes, coats, overcoats, knitwear, Jean shirts and baby and children products by overlapping the two sides of the fabrics.


Stainless prong snap button with pearl cap consists of 4 pieces.

These are;

  • Stainless prong snap button with pearl cap,
  • Stainless socket,
  • Stainless stud,
  • Stainless prong Snap button.

Application;

In combination with special fastening molds;

  • In hand press,
  • In armed machine,
  • In motored and automatic machines.

Measure ;

The production is made in the dimensions specified by Cebeci Button reference table.

Logo;

The desired text or logo can be made with laser on the prong snap button with pearl cap. At the same time, transparent top of pearl is made as button and printing on the bottom part is produced as desired lettering or logo. (You can contact Ata manufacturing authorities by filling out the form on the contact page).

Feature; 

Stainless pearl cap part of the prong snap button can be casted in the desired color.

Depending on the type of fabric to be applied, stainless prong snap button with pearl cap can be selected as long or short legged. We can make experiments with mock-ups you send to us, then you can decide on the leg length. We can also provide you with information on how to press the prong snap button with pearl cap on the fabric by preparing a data sheet. It is important that there is no pile difference on the fabric where the pressing is to be made.

The desired colors can be produced from the veneer sheet of the metal back of the pearl cap. (the metal back cannot be painted)


For order and information supply, you can contact our customer representatives through the contact page and request samples before ordering.

products.name: Capped Rivet
products.description_html:
Capped rivets are produced from brass material and resistant to corrosion. Areas of use include jackets, shirts, Jean shirts, trousers, shoes, baby and children's products. The capped rivet serves as an ornament.

Capped rivets consists of 2 parts.

These are;

  • Capped rivet,
  • Nail,

Application;

In combination with special fastening molds;

  • In hand press,
  • In armed machine,
  • In motored and automatic machines.

Measure;

Capped rivets can be manufactured in the dimensions specified by Cebeci Buttons reference table.

Logo;

Capped rivets can be produced with logo. (You can contact Cebeci Buttons authorities by filling the form on the contact page for logo printing).

Feature;

At Cebeci Buttons, we can come to a clearer understanding and help you better if we receive mock-up products for where the capped rivets will be pressed. Then, we can make experiments on them. If there is any pile difference on the fabric, we suggest you to open holes before the pressing took place. We can also provide you with information on how to press the capped rivets by preparing a data sheet report. Capped rivets can be produced in desired colors by selecting them from the coating chart.

For order and information supply, you can contact our customer representatives through the contact page and request samples before ordering.

products.name: Molds
products.description_html:
Molds are the iron material used to fasten metal accessories into the fabric. Each product has its own pattern. The patterns of firms may vary. Mold parts may differ according to the product. Products such as buttons and rivets have 2 sets of molds and spring snap buttons have 4 parts.

Molds made of automation steel can be made by using air steel upon request.

Application;
It is very important to make a suitable mold for the pile driving machine and not pile without metal accessories. In this way, the mold can be used for long life.

Measure ;
The part of the mold which is attached to the machine is made upon request.

Logo;
Molds can be made on the company name. You can contact us for this.
specifications: Thank you for your interest - Cebeci Buttons

products.name: Fastening Machines
products.description_html:
Many textile accessories manufactured and sold by our company are used by assembling. In order to perform the said assembly process, assembly machines that differ in technical and operating principles are used.

These machines are divided into three different groups, which are;

  • Manual,
  • Manual motored
  • Automatic

1- Manual Machines;

Manual fastening machines are used in assembly processes based entirely on muscle strength. Setting the place where the product is to be assembled, placing the product to be assembled and applying the necessary force is done entirely by manpower.

2- Motorized Manual Fastening Machines;

Motorized manual nailing machines, the difference in manual nailing machines is that the power required for installation from the engine. Again, the place where the product will pressed and the placement of the product to be fastened are done by hand. Motorized fastening machines have the ability to adjust the pressure to be applied during assembly. In this way, deformation can be minimized in pile operations to be made on different fabrics.

3- Automatic Fastening Machines;

Automatic fastening machines have high production capacity due to the fast working principle. Adjusting the power required for product feed and fastening on the machine side saves time and minimizes your error rate.
specifications: Thank you for your interest - Cebeci Buttons
